name: Drealegy
description:
Prepare to be mind-blown with a mix-perspective Rougvania!



Fight inner demons in your dreams to obtain the energy to communicate in the real world. The main protagonist, Evelynn, wants to make her music band, but she can't talk to people at all due to her shyness.. to reach her goal she needs to fight demons every night to ask people out, build connections and rehearse together.

Explore the Dream Castle full of traps, inner demons, and emotional energy. Prepare for fluid platforming in the sidescroller, brutal top-down hacknslash, and some mind-bending surprises.

Use your emotional energy to build connections and bring people in your music band. Not only rehearse with them in rhythm minigame but hang out and go on a date with your favorite ones <3

In this night-day cycle, you will achieve the main character's lifelong dream to make a music band - a last wish from her dying mother

.
